job.title: Software Engineer In Test
job.description:
Our vision is to provide a data-driven, cloud-native solution that connects the front and back office of global asset and wealth managers through exception-based workflows and seamless collaboration across analytics, portfolio construction, trading, settlement, and compliance. We are growing team with a start-up mentality and we are looking for motivated people who want to be part of an exciting growth opportunity in the Fintech industry.
As an experienced Software Engineer in Test, you will play a critical role in designing, developing, and improving automation frameworks across the platform. You are an engineer at heart who is passionate about evolving our testing infrastructure and continually evaluating our toolsets and methodologies to support CI/CD. You will work alongside a cross-functional team comprised of Product Management, Software Engineering, and Quality Assurance as a champion for functional, scalability, and performance testing to maintain our high standards for quality.
Job Responsibilities
Architect, design, and lead our automating testing infrastructure and testing strategy to support cloud continuous integration and continuous delivery
Evaluate existing automation frameworks and define clear steps and processes to improve testing procedures
Lead efforts to improve code coverage and partner with quality assurance leadership to prioritize closing gap in automated testing for the cloud platform, applications and micro services
Develop expertise in client workflows to build comprehensive testing strategies for functional, integration, and performance tests
Research and prototype new tools to drive architectural decisions
Work with product management, quality assurance, and software engineers to produce on-time, high-quality releases
Define clear goals for all aspects of a product test and define steps for their proper execution
Properly document test cases and create effective and focused testing plans to drive the platform's quality team
Partner with Quality Assurance Engineers to develop automated regression testing for the product using Postman, Jenkins and other tools
Qualifications / Requirements
BS in software engineering, computer science, or related field
3+ years or equivalent experience with web and API automation testing
Current understanding of best practices regarding system security measures
Proficient in CI/CD pipeline development
Solid experience with GIT and source control
Passion for solving complex problems and can-do attitude
Strong communications skills
Burning desire to learn and continually improve
Bonus Skills
3+ years experience in software development with languages such as Python, Java Script, Perl, Ruby, SQL
Experience in data pipeline testing such as ETL tests, data warehouse tests, etc
Experience in chaos engineering
At SS&C Advent, you’ll find a rewarding career where you can thrive at every level. We invest in our employees through offering competitive compensation and benefits, progressive training opportunities, and wellness programs that empower employees to achieve total (physical, financial, social & community) well-being. Advent’s culture thrives on teamwork and diversity. Plus, a Global Flexible Time Off (FTO) policy, providing the freedom and flexibility to take the time off that you need - when you need it. So, bring your unique perspective and talent to Advent and thrive in your work today!
